name: EXCELLOUS SOCIETY

address: Dhakuria, Opp. Jodhpur Park Petrol Pump,

briefDescription: Excellous society is working on environment, Disaster Risk reduction and preparedness. So far we have served 2000 students of four schools in Kolkata and surrounds by conducting Free School Safety Workshop. We had also organised in last March an International Conference on Disaster Risk Reduction in collaboration with DMM Dept. Govt. of West Bengal and about 200 people attended from various part of the country and abroad. Our next ICDRR 2017 will be announced shortly.
